All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter<String,​Long>, StringConverter<Long>, TwoWayConverter<String,​Long>, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject, Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver
public class FormattedLongConverter extends BaseStringConverter<Long>
Converts a Long to and from a formatted string.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
